Dev Stats Dashboard

I designed a tv stats board for a team of developers who wanted to get a snapshot of site traffic, page speed, cache stats, site errors, and git merges to production.

Role

UI Designer

Project Type

Dashboard

Designed in Sketch, developed prototype in HTML.
